data.title: Early Round ZERO/POINT For Market
data.description: For fast information on Attackers at Market, use this knife lineup early into the round.

data.title: Early Round A Main ZERO/POINT from A Site
data.description: Here's a great way to scan players toward the A Side Attacker Spawn Barrier from A Site at the beginning of the round.

data.title: Early Round B Main ZERO/POINT for B Ramp
data.description: Here's a simple, but effective way to check for players pushing through B Ramp into B Main from the B Attacker Spawn Barrier.
